reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of PHIL 314, PHIL 315, PHIL 340.
Instructor: Anders Kraal.
Kant is often considered the greatest of modern philosophers. This course starts with a study of some metaphysical and ethical themes in Kants Critique of Pure Reason and Fundamental Principles of the Metaphysics of Morals, and then focuses on how these themes come together in Kants Religion within the Boundaries of Mere Reason.
